item.title: Class 701, hot chocolate, and more
item.description: i've now seperated some train content (only the not project style things) into a new section, /train! speaking of which, i finally managed to get a BR Class 701! also i've rated (and downgraded) more hot chocolates on my tierlist (/projects/hot-choc) and generally updated some small QoL stuff on the site :)

item.title: Northumberland line visit!
item.description: i went to visit the newly reopened Northumberland line from Newcastle to Ashington when it opened on sunday!

item.title: Cardiff platform zero complete!
item.description: finally, i've visited the platform zero at Cardiff, bringing my total to 8/9 UK platforms and 8/10 european ones.

item.title: hot chocolate tierlist now has a page
item.description: i've been ranking hot chocolates for a while and am making a tierlist of them. now it's on my website

item.title: i have an rss feed now?
item.description: i have an rss feed now, i'll probably do something with it at some point
